byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA

abstract: Leaders from Britain, United States and other nations, at conference in London, pledge to cooperate on sweeping efforts against financial corruption; British Prime Min David Cameron outlines transparency moves to battle offshore tax evasion.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cameron, representing Britain, outlined measures to fight offshore tax evasion as he met with Secretary of State John Kerry and other leaders in London.

headline.main: David Cameron Leads a Call to Thwart Financial Corruption
headline.print_headline: Leaders Vow to Thwart Financial Corruption

snippet: Mr. Cameron, representing Britain, outlined measures to fight offshore tax evasion as he met with Secretary of State John Kerry and other leaders in London.
